title: Badlands National Park: Cooperating Association
body: Cooperating Association          The Badlands Natural History Association is a nonprofit, cooperating association of Badlands National Park. Profits from their sales are donated to the park to print the park newspaper, fund the Internship Program, purchase library books, support scientific research projects, improve and maintain photographic and museum collections, and fund the Artist in Residence Program. Executive Director: Katie Johnston Contact Information: P.O. Box 47; Interior, SD 57750 (605) 433-5489 (605) 433-5248 fax
